title: Contemporary Duplex Living by the Kazimierz Dolny Rynek
description: Nestled just off the vibrant Rynek square, this stunning 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom duplex offers a seamless blend of traditional charm and modern functionality. Spanning a spacious 140 sqm, the home boasts generous living areas, sleek Scandinavian-inspired interiors, and energy-efficient features. Enjoy evening gatherings in the bright, open-plan kitchen and unwind with the tranquility offered by soundproof walls.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Kazimierz Dolny’s historic Rynek, this area is famed for its creative spirit and peaceful, eco-conscious ambiance. You’ll discover local cafés, artisanal boutiques, and charming green parks all within easy reach, making it ideal for young families who value both culture and community. The low urban density enables a relaxed lifestyle surrounded by history and renowned natural beauty.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to green spaces for children’s play
access to cycling and hiking trails
target_buyer: Ideal for young professional couples and families who appreciate heritage environments but desire contemporary amenities and space to grow.
market_positioning: A rare turnkey duplex providing high-quality modern living amid Kazimierz Dolny’s most coveted historic setting—tailor-made for young families seeking a blend of character, lifestyle, and comfort.
